dcterms:creator: Douglas Oard
William Webber
David Kirsch
Sergey Golitsynskiy
dcterms:description: The Avocado Research Email Collection consists of emails and attachments taken from 279 accounts of an information technology company named 'Avocado'. Each email is treated as a document with its subject as the title.
dcterms:title: Avocado Research Email Collection

dcterms:creator: Jianmo Ni
Jiacheng Li
Julian McAuley
dcterms:description: The Amazon review data provides user reviews from Amazon on different product categories, specifically focusing on the largest category, books, which has the largest number of reviews. Reviews are treated as documents with review titles as document titles.
dcterms:title: Amazon review data

dcterms:creator: Stuck_In_the_Matrix
dcterms:description: The Reddit comments dataset consists of all the posts and comments available on Reddit from 2007 to 2015. Both posts and comments are treated as documents and grouped by users.
dcterms:title: Reddit comments dataset
